overview:
David Orrico joined InsideSales.com in September 2012 as the VP of Enterprise Sales. He is a 30 year veteran of the SaaS technology industry.

After three years as VP of Worldwide Sales at C3 Energy Networks, David left C3 Networks where he worked with Thomas M. Seibel, CEO, and former founder and CEO of Seibel Systems, with whom he had worked previously. Prior to C3 Energy, he was Vice President of Worldwide Sales at Appirio for just over a year. Dave joined Appirio after serving as Executive Vice President of Enterprise Sales at salesforce.com from 2003 through 2009, where he worked for Jim Steele and Marc Beniof to help launch and build the Enterprise Channel from its inception.

Prior to salesforce.com, Dave served as Vice President of Eastern Operations for Siebel Systems for seven years from 1997 through 2003. Previous to Siebel, he held a number of sales and management positions while at Oracle for seven years from 1989 to 1996, where he first met and worked closely with Marc Benioff. Orrico also served several years in sales and management at Automatic Data Processing, Inc., or ADP.

David earned a B.S. in Business Administration from Georgetown University.
